content: Further up the mountain path, you'll encounter a second type of fighter - the Fly-Whisk Daoist. More support than main attacker, they'll harass you with a variety of wind and force projectiles, and while you'll need to dodge the waves, you can deflect the smaller wind projectiles with your staff.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Temple_of_Yellow_Flowers_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Temple of Yellow Flowers Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Mountain Trail'.
The content is as follows:
Further up the mountain path, you'll encounter a second type of fighter - the Fly-Whisk Daoist. More support than main attacker, they'll harass you with a variety of wind and force projectiles, and while you'll need to dodge the waves, you can deflect the smaller wind projectiles with your staff.
